title: 11/19/20 HOUR 1- Marc Stein
itunes:title: 11/19/20 HOUR 1- Marc Stein
description:
Marc Stein talks to Dan about the stories behind the stories from the 2020 NBA draft. Marc says that the news of Klay Thompson really killed the mood right before the draft started.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
